Overview

Living a better life is not always enough to rectify sins from the past, and Molloy (Ray Liotta) is a former criminal who learns this when his previous misdeeds catch up with him in Bad Karma. Molloy is a reformed drug addict who now lives a normal life and is on the verge of proposing to Kelly (Vanessa Gray), his girlfriend, when a thug from his old life threatens to ruin his happiness. Mack (Dominic Purcell) is Molloy's old partner who asks for help with one more scheme, but the criminal also resents Molloy and wants to see him suffer. Mack stalks Kelly to force Molloy to help him, and Molloy must find a way to save Kelly while avoiding retribution for his past mistakes.
